Module CAMs
Package controllers

Class CCMController

java.lang.Object
controllers.UserController
controllers.CCMController
public class CCMController extends UserController
The CCMController class handles user interactions for the Camp Committee Members (which are Students with enum set to CCM). It is responsible for application level tasks. It utilizes services ICampStudentService and SuggestionRequestService,EnquiryRequestService to perform lower level tasks for camp and requests respectively. It extends UserController.
